Wellen -- a framework for exploring and teaching generative music making and algorithmic compositions

See Wellen for further information.

Package wellen

Class Tone

java.lang.Object
wellen.Tone
public abstract class Tone extends Object
Tone handles instruments and the playing of musical notes.
